definition: to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)

sentences.english: 1971 - Democratic Republic of the Congo is renamed Zaire.
sentences.chinese: 1971年的今天，刚果民主共和国重命名为扎伊尔。

sentences.english: Okay, in terms of software engineering, you've been working on Zair for many decades.
sentences.chinese: 好了，在软件工程，你是在扎伊尔几十年。

sentences.english: My older son, Zaire, is exactly the same way.
sentences.chinese: 我的大儿子扎伊尔也是一样。

sentences.english: Zaid ran with his wife toward the sound, toward the border.
sentences.chinese: 扎伊尔德和妻子朝着那声音，往边界跑去。

sentences.english: A city of north-central Zambia near the Zaire border.
sentences.chinese: 基特韦赞比亚中北部靠近扎伊尔边境的城市。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Sudan/sultan (ruler of some Muslim states, esp. Ottoman Emperor)
